title: Bug 124066: Insert chart not translated into Chinese in context menu
description: When right clicking in the layout to bring up the context menu, the 'Insert chart' option is not translated into Chinese.
OB: Expected behavior: When right clicking in the layout to bring up the context menu, the 'Insert chart' option should be translated into Chinese.
EB: Actual behavior: When right clicking in the layout to bring up the context menu, the 'Insert chart' option is not translated into Chinese.
SR: Please investigate and fix the issue causing the 'Insert chart' option in the context menu to not be translated into Chinese.
